title: Interior Designer
job_overview:
We are looking for an experienced and talented Interior Designer who is proficient in Chief
Architect, SketchUp, or other rendering software to join our team. This role requires a
solid understanding of interior design principles, along with the ability to work with detailed
floor plans and spaces. The ideal candidate will have experience working in residential
design, with a deep knowledge of materials, color schemes, furniture, lighting, and spatial
planning.

Key Responsibilities:
• Create comprehensive interior design plans and layouts using Chief Architect,
SketchUp, or other 3D rendering software.
• Develop mood boards, color palettes, and material selections to bring each project
vision to life.
• Ensure designs meet all necessary functional, safety, and accessibility
requirements.
• Maintain project documentation, including design drawings, specifications, and
schedules.
• Create detailed specification sheets for materials, furniture, finishes, lighting, and
other elements of the design.

Required Skills & Qualifications:
• Proven experience in interior design with a strong portfolio of completed projects.
• Expertise in Chief Architect and SketchUp (or other comparable rendering
software).
• Ability to create detailed, high-quality 3D visualizations and floor plans.
• Strong understanding of the American imperial system for design and construction
(inches, feet, etc.).
• Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively in a remote
team environment.
• Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.
• Knowledge of current trends in interior design, furniture, lighting, and finishes.
• Familiarity with basic building codes and regulations in the United States.
• Strong attention to detail and a keen eye for design aesthetics.
• A degree in Interior Design or a related field is required.

How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, portfolio, a brief cover letter and a short video outlining your
experience and why you’d be a great fit for this role. In your portfolio, please highlight your
expertise in Chief Architect or SketchUp and any relevant design work completed. Please
change the subject line to your name and potential start date.

We look forward to reviewing your application and potentially welcoming you to our
creative team!
